member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Jobs.ServiceBusTriggerAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that binds a parameter to a Service Bus Queue message, causing the method to run when a message is enqueued.
member.remarks:
The method parameter type can be one of the following:
BrokeredMessage
A user-defined type (serialized as JSON)
